Package org.soulwing.prospecto.api.converter

Model type to value type conversion

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ValueTypeConverter<V>
    A converter that transforms simple model objects into a suitable representation for a view node of value type and vice-versa.
    ValueTypeConverters
    A mutable ordered collection of ValueTypeConverters.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CalendarTypeConverter
    A ValueTypeConverter that converts Calendar objects to and from a string representation.
    CalendarTypeConverter.Builder
    A builder that produces a CalendarTypeConverter.
    Coerce
    A type coercion utility.
    DateTypeConverter
    A ValueTypeConverter that converts Date objects to and from a string representation.
    DateTypeConverter.Builder
    A builder that produces a DateTypeConverter.
    PropertyExtractingValueTypeConverter
    A converter that extracts a single String, Number, Boolean, Enum, or Date property from a model object.
    PropertyExtractingValueTypeConverter.Builder
    A builder that produces a PropertyExtractingValueTypeConverter.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DateTypeConverter.Format  

Package org.soulwing.prospecto.api.converter Description

Model type to value type conversion

View nodes of value type have a limited range of supported data types (String, Number, Boolean, Enum). This package provides an API for converting between model value types and view value types, and provides some useful implementations for JDK value types (e.g. Date). You can write your own ValueTypeConverter implementations to support your model's value types.

Converter instances are registered with a ViewContext by putting them to the list returned by ViewContext.getValueTypeConverters(). The converters in the list are consulted in order; the first converter to claim support for a given type will be used for all model instances of that type.
